description.zh-cn: 指薄熙来担任中共重庆市委书记期间在重庆市推行的一系列政治经济政策。
description.en: Refers to a series of political and economic policies implemented in Chongqing during Bo Xilai's tenure as the secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党重庆市委员会书记，“重庆模式”的主要推动者。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee and was the main promoter of the 'Chongqing Model'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，“重庆模式”的实施地。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China, and the place where the 'Chongqing Model' was implemented.

nodes.id: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

zh-cn: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 在薄熙来和王立军主导下，重庆市展开的打击有组织犯罪和腐败的专项行动。
description.en: A special campaign led by Bo Xilai and Wang Lijun in Chongqing to crack down on organized crime and corruption.

nodes.id: 唱红歌、读经典、讲故事、传箴言

zh-cn: 唱红歌、读经典、讲故事、传箴言
宣扬中国共产党传统革命思想

description.zh-cn: 重庆模式期间推广的一项意识形态宣传活动，要求市民歌唱红色歌曲、阅读经典、讲述故事、传播箴言。
description.en: An ideological propaganda campaign promoted during the Chongqing Model period, requiring citizens to sing red songs, read classics, tell stories, and spread maxims.

description.zh-cn: 指2008年爆发的全球性金融危机。此次危机为重庆模式的出现提供了背景。
description.en: Refers to the global financial crisis that broke out in 2008. This crisis provided the backdrop for the emergence of the Chongqing Model.

description.zh-cn: 一个政治意识形态派别，在中国语境下通常指支持更多国家干预和强调意识形态纯洁性的人士。
description.en: A political ideological faction, which in the Chinese context usually refers to those who support more state intervention and emphasize ideological purity.

description.zh-cn: 与重庆模式同时期，在中国广东省出现的政治经济改革模式，常与重庆模式作比较。
description.en: A model of political and economic reform that appeared in Guangdong Province, China, during the same period as the Chongqing Model, and is often compared with it.

description.zh-cn: 指2012年2月时任重庆市副市长王立军进入美国驻成都总领事馆滞留事件，该事件直接导致了薄熙来的下台和重庆模式的终结。
description.en: Refers to the incident in February 2012 when then-Vice Mayor of Chongqing Wang Lijun entered and stayed at the US Consulate General in Chengdu. The incident directly led to the downfall of Bo Xilai and the end of the Chongqing Model.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任重庆市公安局局长，是‘重庆打黑’行动的主要执行者，其出走事件直接导致了薄熙来下台。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Director of the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau and was the main executor of the 'Chongqing Strike Black' campaign. His defection attempt directly led to the downfall of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市人民政府下设主管全市公安工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department under the Chongqing Municipal People's Government responsible for public security work throughout the city.

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市司法局局长，在重庆打黑除恶专项行动中落网并被执行死刑。
description.en: Former Director of the Chongqing Municipal Bureau of Justice, who was arrested and executed during the 'Chongqing Strike Black' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾在薄熙来之前担任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee before Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 美国前国务卿及国际关系专家，曾对薄熙来时期的重庆发展持正面评价。
description.en: Former U.S. Secretary of State and expert in international relations, who once held a positive view of Chongqing's development during Bo Xilai's era.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。重庆模式的批评者认为该模式是回到毛泽东时代的极左路线。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. Critics of the Chongqing Model believed it was a return to the ultra-leftist line of the Mao Zedong era.

description.zh-cn: 中国法学家，对重庆模式持批评态度，认为其“打黑”是“黑打”，破坏法治。
description.en: A Chinese legal scholar who was critical of the Chongqing Model, arguing that its 'strike black' campaign was an illegal crackdown that undermined the rule of law.

description.zh-cn: 中国法学家，对重庆模式持批评态度，认为其“打黑”是“黑打”，破坏法治。
description.en: A Chinese legal scholar who was critical of the Chongqing Model, arguing that its 'strike black' campaign was an illegal crackdown that undermined the rule of law.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，对重庆模式的土地政策持批评态度。
description.en: A Chinese economist who was critical of the land policies of the Chongqing Model.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。他曾公开批评薄熙来和重庆模式。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He has publicly criticized Bo Xilai and the Chongqing Model.

description.zh-cn: 指英国商人尼尔·海伍德在重庆被薄熙来妻子谷开来谋杀的案件，此案是薄熙来政治生涯终结的关键事件之一。
description.en: Refers to the murder of British businessman Neil Heywood in Chongqing by Gu Kailai, Bo Xilai's wife. This case was one of the key events that ended Bo Xilai's political career.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在薄熙来被免职后接任中共重庆市委书记，并公开否定“重庆模式”的存在。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Bo Xilai as Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee after his dismissal, and publicly denied the existence of the 'Chongqing Model'.

description.zh-cn: 指律师李庄在为重庆涉黑案嫌疑人辩护期间，被控伪证罪并被判刑的事件，是重庆打黑运动中标志性的争议案件。
description.en: Refers to the incident where lawyer Li Zhuang was charged with perjury and sentenced while defending a suspect in a Chongqing organized crime case. It is a landmark controversial case in the Chongqing 'strike black' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国律师，因在重庆打黑运动期间为涉黑案件辩护而被以伪证罪判刑，该案引发巨大争议。
description.en: A Chinese lawyer who was sentenced for perjury while defending a client in an organized crime case during the Chongqing 'strike black' campaign. The case caused significant controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中国左派政治思想网站，曾开设专题赞扬重庆模式。
description.en: A Chinese left-wing political thought website that once featured a special section praising the Chongqing Model.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在薄熙来主政重庆期间长期担任重庆市市长，是重庆经济发展的重要人物。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Mayor of Chongqing for a long time while Bo Xilai was in charge, and was a key figure in Chongqing's economic development.

relationships.target: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来曾任中共重庆市委书记，于2012年3月15日被免职。
description.en: Bo Xilai served as the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee and was dismissed on March 15, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来是重庆模式的主要设计者和推动者。
description.en: Bo Xilai was the main architect and promoter of the Chongqing Model.

description.zh-cn: 重庆模式是在重庆市推行的一系列政治经济政策。
description.en: The Chongqing Model was a series of political and economic policies implemented in the city of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 2008年金融海啸后中国经济发展遭遇瓶颈，在此背景下，重庆的经济发展表现使其“重庆模式”受到关注。
description.en: After the 2008 financial crisis caused a bottleneck in China's economic development, Chongqing's economic performance brought attention to its 'Chongqing Model'.

description.zh-cn: 重庆模式吸引了中国左派人士的关注和支持，并由他们将其归结为一种发展模式。
description.en: The Chongqing Model attracted the attention and support of Chinese leftists, who summarized it as a development model.

description.zh-cn: 在舆论和学术界，重庆模式常被视为与广东省的政治改革（广东模式）相对立的发展路径。
description.en: In public opinion and academia, the Chongqing Model was often seen as a developmental path opposing the political reforms in Guangdong Province (the Guangdong Model).

description.zh-cn: 王立军事件的爆发直接导致薄熙来于2012年3月15日被免去中共重庆市委书记职务并接受审查。
description.en: The outbreak of the Wang Lijun incident directly led to Bo Xilai's dismissal as Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee on March 15, 2012, and his subsequent investigation.

description.zh-cn: 随着王立军事件的爆发及薄熙来的去职，重庆模式随之终结。
description.en: Following the outbreak of the Wang Lijun incident and the removal of Bo Xilai, the Chongqing Model came to an end.

relationships.target: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来在任内主导并发起了重庆打黑除恶专项行动。
description.en: During his tenure, Bo Xilai led and launched the Chongqing 'strike black and eradicate evil' special campaign.

description.zh-cn: 2008年6月，王立军调任重庆市公安局局长。
description.en: In June 2008, Wang Lijun was transferred to the position of Director of the Chongqing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

relationships.source: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市司法局局长文强在打黑行动中落网。
description.en: Wen Qiang, former Director of the Chongqing Municipal Bureau of Justice, was arrested during the 'strike black' campaign.

relationships.source: 重庆打黑除恶专项行动

description.zh-cn: 李庄案是重庆打黑运动中引发巨大争议的标志性案件。
description.en: The Li Zhuang case was a landmark controversial case that arose from the Chongqing 'strike black' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 律师李庄在李庄案中被以“伪证罪”获刑。
description.en: Lawyer Li Zhuang was sentenced for 'perjury' in the Li Zhuang case.

relationships.target: 唱红歌、读经典、讲故事、传箴言

description.zh-cn: “唱红歌、读经典、讲故事、传箴言”活动是重庆模式在意识形态领域的重要组成部分。
description.en: The 'Singing red songs, reading classics, telling stories, and spreading maxims' campaign was an important ideological component of the Chongqing Model.

description.zh-cn: 美国前国务卿基辛格对薄熙来时期重庆的发展持正面评价。
description.en: Former U.S. Secretary of State Henry Kissinger held a positive evaluation of Chongqing's development during Bo Xilai's era.

description.zh-cn: 反对者认为，重庆模式是回到毛泽东时代的极左模式，体现了毛泽东时代的部分特征。
description.en: Opponents believed that the Chongqing Model was a return to the ultra-leftist model of the Mao Zedong era, reflecting some of its characteristics.

description.zh-cn: 法学家何兵批评重庆模式中的“打黑”是“黑打”，破坏了法制。
description.en: Legal scholar He Bing criticized the 'strike black' campaign within the Chongqing Model as an illegal crackdown that undermined the rule of law.

description.zh-cn: 法学家张千帆批评重庆模式中的“打黑”是“黑打”，破坏了法制。
description.en: Legal scholar Zhang Qianfan criticized the 'strike black' campaign within the Chongqing Model as an illegal crackdown that undermined the rule of law.

description.zh-cn: 经济学家夏业良批评重庆的户籍新政策是一种剥夺。
description.en: Economist Xia Yeliang criticized Chongqing's new household registration policy as a form of deprivation.

description.zh-cn: 在一次中共中央政治局会议上，习近平评价重庆模式是服务于薄熙来个人政治野心的“为自己造势的行动”。
description.en: At a Politburo meeting, Xi Jinping evaluated the Chongqing Model as 'an action to build momentum for himself' that served Bo Xilai's personal political ambitions.

description.zh-cn: 海伍德死亡案的曝光是导致薄熙来政治生涯终结的关键事件之一，据称他为不影响政治前途而隐瞒此案。
description.en: The exposure of the Death of Neil Heywood was one of the key events that led to the end of Bo Xilai's political career; it is alleged that he concealed the case to avoid affecting his political future.

relationships.target: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 张德江于2012年3月15日接替薄熙来，出任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Zhang Dejiang succeeded Bo Xilai as the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee on March 15, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十八大期间，接任重庆市委书记的张德江公开声称“根本就不存在重庆模式”，从官方层面否定了该模式。
description.en: During the 18th CPC National Congress, Zhang Dejiang, the new Party Secretary of Chongqing, publicly stated that 'the Chongqing Model fundamentally does not exist,' officially negating the model.

description.zh-cn: 作为左派网站，乌有之乡曾开设专题区赞扬重庆模式，是其重要的舆论支持者。
description.en: As a left-wing website, Utopia created a special section to praise the Chongqing Model, acting as one of its important public opinion supporters.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来担任中共重庆市委书记期间，黄奇帆担任重庆市市长，两人是“重庆模式”时期的主要党政领导。
description.en: While Bo Xilai was the CPC Secretary of Chongqing, Huang Qifan was the Mayor. They were the main party and government leaders during the 'Chongqing Model' era.
